title: Key Features of $TUPA 🔑
description: 🌱 Staking: Within the Turtle Papa ecosystem, users can actively participate in staking activities, enabling them to lock up their $TUPA tokens and contribute to the network's security and stability. By staking, users are rewarded with additional tokens, encouraging long-term participation and commitment to the project. Additionally, coming soon, through collaboration with MEME MAFIA, users staking $TUPA will have the opportunity to earn $MEM tokens.
